Kassiopeia  3
Monte Carlo simulation program specializing in tracking particles in electric and magnetic fields

14  KSTrajTrajectoryAdiabatic::KSTrajTrajectoryAdiabatic() :

16  fIntermediateParticle(),

18  fError(),
19  fIntegrator( NULL ),

21  fTerms(),
22  fControls(),
23  fPiecewiseTolerance(1e-9),
24  fNMaxSegments(1),
25  fUseTruePostion(true),
26  fCyclotronFraction(1.0/8.0),
27  fMaxAttempts(32)
28  {
29  }

55  void KSTrajTrajectoryAdiabatic::SetIntegrator( KSTrajAdiabaticIntegrator* anIntegrator )
56  {
57  if( fIntegrator == NULL )
58  {
59  fIntegrator = anIntegrator;
60  return;
61  }
62  trajmsg( eError ) << "cannot set integrator in <" << this->GetName() << "> with <" << anIntegrator << ">" << eom;
63  return;
64  }
65  void KSTrajTrajectoryAdiabatic::ClearIntegrator( KSTrajAdiabaticIntegrator* anIntegrator )
66  {
67  if( fIntegrator == anIntegrator )
68  {
69  fIntegrator = NULL;
70  return;
71  }
72  trajmsg( eError ) << "cannot clear integrator in <" << this->GetName() << "> with <" << anIntegrator << ">" << eom;
73  return;
74  }

135  void KSTrajTrajectoryAdiabatic::Reset()
136  {
137  if(fIntegrator != NULL){ fIntegrator->ClearState(); }
138  fInitialParticle = 0.0;
139  fFinalParticle = 0.0;
140  };
141 
142  void KSTrajTrajectoryAdiabatic::CalculateTrajectory( const KSParticle& anInitialParticle, KSParticle& aFinalParticle, KThreeVector& aCenter, double& aRadius, double& aTimeStep )
143  {
144  static const double sMinimalStep = numeric_limits< double >::min(); // smallest positive value
145 
146  fInitialParticle = fFinalParticle;
147  fInitialParticle.PullFrom( anInitialParticle );
148  double currentTime = fInitialParticle.GetTime();
149 
150  //spray
151  trajmsg_debug( "initial real position: " << fInitialParticle.GetPosition() << ret )
152  trajmsg_debug( "initial real momentum: " << fInitialParticle.GetMomentum() << ret )
153  trajmsg_debug( "initial gc position: " << fInitialParticle.GetGuidingCenter() << ret )
154  trajmsg_debug( "initial gc alpha: " << fInitialParticle.GetAlpha() << ret )
155  trajmsg_debug( "initial gc beta: " << fInitialParticle.GetBeta() << ret )
156  trajmsg_debug( "initial parallel momentum: <" << fInitialParticle[5] << ">" << ret )
157  trajmsg_debug( "initial perpendicular momentum: <" << fInitialParticle[6] << ">" << ret )
158  trajmsg_debug( "initial kinetic energy is: <" << fInitialParticle.GetKineticEnergy()/ KConst::Q() << ">" << eom )
159 
160  bool tFlag;
161  double tStep;
162  double tSmallestStep = numeric_limits< double >::max();
163  unsigned int iterCount = 0;
164 
165  while( true )
166  {
167  for( int tIndex = 0; tIndex < fControls.End(); tIndex++ )
168  {
169  fControls.ElementAt( tIndex )->Calculate( fInitialParticle, tStep );
170  if( tStep < tSmallestStep )
171  {
172  tSmallestStep = tStep;
173  }
174  }
175 
176  trajmsg_debug( "time step is <" << tSmallestStep << ">" << eom );
177 
178  fIntegrator->Integrate(currentTime, *this, fInitialParticle, tSmallestStep, fFinalParticle, fError );
179 
180 
181  if(fAbortSignal)
182  {
183  trajmsg( eWarning ) << "trajectory <" << GetName() << "> encountered an abort signal " << eom;
184  aFinalParticle = anInitialParticle;
185  aFinalParticle.SetActive( false );
186  aFinalParticle.SetLabel( "trajectory_abort" );
187  fIntegrator->ClearState();
188  break;
189  }
190 
191  tFlag = true;
192  for( int tIndex = 0; tIndex < fControls.End(); tIndex++ )
193  {
194  fControls.ElementAt( tIndex )->Check( fInitialParticle, fFinalParticle, fError, tFlag );
195  if( tFlag == false )
196  {
197  double tCurrentStep = tSmallestStep;
198  fControls.ElementAt( tIndex )->Calculate( fInitialParticle, tSmallestStep );
199  if ( fabs( tCurrentStep - tSmallestStep ) < sMinimalStep )
200  {
201  trajmsg( eWarning ) << "trajectory <" << GetName() << "> could not decide on a valid stepsize" << eom;
202  aFinalParticle = anInitialParticle;
203  aFinalParticle.SetActive( false );
204  aFinalParticle.SetLabel( "trajectory_fail" );
205  fIntegrator->ClearState();
206  tFlag = true;
207  }
208 
209  trajmsg_debug( "trajectory <" << GetName() << "> re-attempting integration step after stepsize control check failed " << eom )
210 
211  break;
212  }
213  }
214 
215  if( tFlag == true )
216  {
217  break;
218  }
219 
220  if(iterCount > fMaxAttempts)
221  {
222  trajmsg( eWarning ) << "trajectory <" << GetName() << "> could not perform a sucessful integration step after <"<<fMaxAttempts<<"> attempts " << eom;
223  aFinalParticle = anInitialParticle;
224  aFinalParticle.SetActive( false );
225  aFinalParticle.SetLabel( "trajectory_fail" );
226  fIntegrator->ClearState();
227  break;
228  }
229 
230  iterCount++;
231 
232 
233 
234  }
235 
236  //compute rotation minimizing frame via double-reflection
237  const KThreeVector tInitialPosition = fInitialParticle.GetGuidingCenter();
238  const KThreeVector tInitialTangent = fInitialParticle.GetMagneticField().Unit();
239  const KThreeVector tInitialNormal = fInitialParticle.GetAlpha();
240  const KThreeVector tFinalPosition = fFinalParticle.GetGuidingCenter();
241  const KThreeVector tFinalTangent = fFinalParticle.GetMagneticField().Unit();
242 
243  KThreeVector tReflectionOneVector = tFinalPosition - tInitialPosition;
244  double tReflectionOne = tReflectionOneVector.MagnitudeSquared();
245  KThreeVector tTangentA = tInitialTangent - (2. / tReflectionOne) * (tReflectionOneVector.Dot( tInitialTangent )) * tReflectionOneVector;
246  KThreeVector tNormalA = tInitialNormal - (2. / tReflectionOne) * (tReflectionOneVector.Dot( tInitialNormal )) * tReflectionOneVector;
247 
248  KThreeVector tReflectionTwoVector = tFinalTangent - tTangentA;
249  double tReflectionTwo = tReflectionTwoVector.MagnitudeSquared();
250  KThreeVector tNormalB = tNormalA - (2. / tReflectionTwo) * (tReflectionTwoVector.Dot( tNormalA )) * tReflectionTwoVector;
251  KThreeVector tNormalC = tNormalB - tNormalB.Dot( tFinalTangent ) * tFinalTangent;
252  KThreeVector tFinalNormal = tNormalC.Unit();
253  KThreeVector tFinalBinormal = tFinalTangent.Cross( tFinalNormal ).Unit();
254 
255  fFinalParticle.SetAlpha( tFinalNormal );
256  fFinalParticle.SetBeta( tFinalBinormal );
257  fFinalParticle.PushTo( aFinalParticle );
258  aFinalParticle.SetLabel( GetName() );
259 
260  trajmsg_debug( "final real position: " << fFinalParticle.GetPosition() << ret )
261  trajmsg_debug( "final real momentum: " << fFinalParticle.GetMomentum() << ret )
262  trajmsg_debug( "final gc position: " << fFinalParticle.GetGuidingCenter() << ret )
263  trajmsg_debug( "final gc alpha: " << fFinalParticle.GetAlpha() << ret )
264  trajmsg_debug( "final gc beta: " << fFinalParticle.GetBeta() << ret )
265  trajmsg_debug( "final parallel momentum: <" << fFinalParticle[5] << ">" << ret )
266  trajmsg_debug( "final perpendicular momentum: <" << fFinalParticle[6] << ">" << ret )
267  trajmsg_debug( "final kinetic energy is: <" << fFinalParticle.GetKineticEnergy()/ KConst::Q() << ">" << eom )
268 
269  if(fInterpolator != NULL)
270  {
271  if(fUseTruePostion)
272  {
273  //we want to approximate the path of the true particle (not just the guiding center)
274  //using the sampling size fCyclotronFraction and the mean cyclotron frequency to dictate
275  //the time step between states and the number of intermediate states we need
276  double mean_cyclotron = (fInitialParticle.GetCyclotronFrequency() + fFinalParticle.GetCyclotronFrequency() )/2.0;
277  double n_periods = ( fFinalParticle.GetTime() - fInitialParticle.GetTime() )*mean_cyclotron;
278  unsigned int n_segments = n_periods/fCyclotronFraction;
279  if(n_segments < 1){n_segments = 1;};
280 
281  fInterpolator->GetPiecewiseLinearApproximation(n_segments,
282  fInitialParticle.GetTime(),
283  fFinalParticle.GetTime(),
284  *fIntegrator,
285  *this,
286  fInitialParticle,
287  fFinalParticle,
288  &fIntermediateParticleStates);
289  }
290  else
291  {
292  //only need to approximate position
293  //(number of samples depends on smoothness of guiding center path)
294  fInterpolator->GetPiecewiseLinearApproximation(fPiecewiseTolerance,
295  fNMaxSegments,
296  fInitialParticle.GetTime(),
297  fFinalParticle.GetTime(),
298  *fIntegrator,
299  *this,
300  fInitialParticle,
301  fFinalParticle,
302  &fIntermediateParticleStates);
303  }
304 
305  //compute the bounding ball
306  unsigned int n_points = fIntermediateParticleStates.size();
307  fBallSupport.Clear();
308  //add first and last points before all others
309  KThreeVector position = fIntermediateParticleStates[0].GetPosition();
310  fBallSupport.AddPoint( KGPoint<3>(position) );
311  position = fIntermediateParticleStates[n_points-1].GetPosition();
312  fBallSupport.AddPoint( KGPoint<3>(position) );
313 
314  for(unsigned int i=1; i<n_points-1; i++)
315  {
316  position = fIntermediateParticleStates[i].GetPosition();
317  fBallSupport.AddPoint( KGPoint<3>(position) );
318  }
319 
320  KGBall<3> boundingBall = fBallSupport.GetMinimalBoundingBall();
321  aCenter = KThreeVector( boundingBall[0], boundingBall[1], boundingBall[2]);
322  aRadius = boundingBall.GetRadius();
323  aTimeStep = tSmallestStep;
324  }
325  else
326  {
327  fIntermediateParticleStates.clear();
328  fIntermediateParticleStates.push_back(fInitialParticle);
329  fIntermediateParticleStates.push_back(fFinalParticle);
330  KThreeVector tInitialFinalLine = fFinalParticle.GetPosition() - fInitialParticle.GetPosition();
331  aCenter = fInitialParticle.GetPosition() + .5 * tInitialFinalLine;
332  aRadius = .5 * tInitialFinalLine.Magnitude();
333  aTimeStep = tSmallestStep;
334  }
335 
336  return;
337  }
338 
339  void KSTrajTrajectoryAdiabatic::ExecuteTrajectory( const double& aTimeStep, KSParticle& anIntermediateParticle ) const
340  {
341  double currentTime = anIntermediateParticle.GetTime();
342  if ( fInterpolator )
343  {
344  fInterpolator->Interpolate(currentTime, *fIntegrator, *this, fInitialParticle, fFinalParticle, aTimeStep, fIntermediateParticle );
345  fIntermediateParticle.PushTo( anIntermediateParticle );
346  return;
347  }
348  else
349  {
350  trajmsg_debug( "execute trajectory without interpolation: "<<ret )
351  trajmsg_debug( "timestep: "<<aTimeStep <<ret )
352  trajmsg_debug( "initial real position: " << fInitialParticle.GetPosition() << ret )
353  trajmsg_debug( "initial real momentum: " << fInitialParticle.GetMomentum() << ret )
354  trajmsg_debug( "initial gc position: " << fInitialParticle.GetGuidingCenter() << ret )
355  trajmsg_debug( "initial gc alpha: " << fInitialParticle.GetAlpha() << ret )
356  trajmsg_debug( "initial gc beta: " << fInitialParticle.GetBeta() << ret )
357  trajmsg_debug( "initial parallel momentum: <" << fInitialParticle[5] << ">" << ret )
358  trajmsg_debug( "initial perpendicular momentum: <" << fInitialParticle[6] << ">" << ret )
359  trajmsg_debug( "initial kinetic energy is: <" << fInitialParticle.GetKineticEnergy()/ KConst::Q() << ">" << eom )
360 
361  if ( aTimeStep == 0.0 )
362  {
363  fIntermediateParticle = fInitialParticle;
364  trajmsg_debug( "timestep was 0, using initial particle" << eom )
365  fIntermediateParticle.PushTo( anIntermediateParticle );
366  return;
367  }
368 
369  fIntegrator->Integrate(currentTime, *this, fInitialParticle, aTimeStep, fIntermediateParticle, fError );
370 
371  //compute rotation minimizing frame via double-reflection
372  const KThreeVector tInitialPosition = fInitialParticle.GetGuidingCenter();
373  const KThreeVector tInitialTangent = fInitialParticle.GetMagneticField().Unit();
374  const KThreeVector tInitialNormal = fInitialParticle.GetAlpha();
375  const KThreeVector tFinalPosition = fIntermediateParticle.GetGuidingCenter();
376  const KThreeVector tFinalTangent = fIntermediateParticle.GetMagneticField().Unit();
377 
378  KThreeVector tReflectionOneVector = tFinalPosition - tInitialPosition;
379  double tReflectionOne = tReflectionOneVector.MagnitudeSquared();
380  KThreeVector tTangentA = tInitialTangent - (2. / tReflectionOne) * (tReflectionOneVector.Dot( tInitialTangent )) * tReflectionOneVector;
381  KThreeVector tNormalA = tInitialNormal - (2. / tReflectionOne) * (tReflectionOneVector.Dot( tInitialNormal )) * tReflectionOneVector;
382 
383  KThreeVector tReflectionTwoVector = tFinalTangent - tTangentA;
384  double tReflectionTwo = tReflectionTwoVector.MagnitudeSquared();
385  KThreeVector tNormalB = tNormalA - (2. / tReflectionTwo) * (tReflectionTwoVector.Dot( tNormalA )) * tReflectionTwoVector;
386  KThreeVector tNormalC = tNormalB - tNormalB.Dot( tFinalTangent ) * tFinalTangent;
387  KThreeVector tFinalNormal = tNormalC.Unit();
388  KThreeVector tFinalBinormal = tFinalTangent.Cross( tFinalNormal ).Unit();
389 
390  fIntermediateParticle.SetAlpha( tFinalNormal );
391  fIntermediateParticle.SetBeta( tFinalBinormal );
392 
393  trajmsg_debug( "intermediate real position: " << fIntermediateParticle.GetPosition() << ret )
394  trajmsg_debug( "intermediate real momentum: " << fIntermediateParticle.GetMomentum() << ret )
395  trajmsg_debug( "intermediate gc position: " << fIntermediateParticle.GetGuidingCenter() << ret )
396  trajmsg_debug( "intermediate gc alpha: " << fIntermediateParticle.GetAlpha() << ret )
397  trajmsg_debug( "intermediate gc beta: " << fIntermediateParticle.GetBeta() << ret )
398  trajmsg_debug( "intermediate parallel momentum: <" << fIntermediateParticle[5] << ">" << ret )
399  trajmsg_debug( "intermediate perpendicular momentum: <" << fIntermediateParticle[6] << ">" << ret )
400  trajmsg_debug( "intermediate kinetic energy is: <" << fIntermediateParticle.GetKineticEnergy()/ KConst::Q() << ">" << eom )
401 
402  fIntermediateParticle.PushTo( anIntermediateParticle );
403  fFinalParticle = fIntermediateParticle;
404  return;
405  }
406  }
407 
408  void KSTrajTrajectoryAdiabatic::GetPiecewiseLinearApproximation(const KSParticle& anInitialParticle, const KSParticle& /*aFinalParticle*/, std::vector< KSParticle >* intermediateParticleStates) const
409  {
410  intermediateParticleStates->clear();
411  for(unsigned int i=0; i<fIntermediateParticleStates.size(); i++)
412  {
413  KSParticle particle(anInitialParticle);
414  particle.ResetFieldCaching();
415  fIntermediateParticleStates[i].PushTo(particle);
416  intermediateParticleStates->push_back(particle);
417  }
418  }
419 
420  void KSTrajTrajectoryAdiabatic::Differentiate(double aTime, const KSTrajAdiabaticParticle& aValue, KSTrajAdiabaticDerivative& aDerivative ) const
421  {
422  //force the cached calculation of magnetic field and gradient combined
423  //(otherwise the magnetic field will be calculated single here and the gradient later also
424  aValue.GetMagneticFieldAndGradient();
425 
426  //the same for the combined cached calculation of the electric field and potential
427  aValue.GetElectricFieldAndPotential();
428 
429  double tLongVelocity = aValue.GetLongVelocity();
430  double tTransVelocity = aValue.GetTransVelocity();
431 
432  // trajmsg_debug( "traj adiabatic long momentum = "<< aValue.GetLongMomentum() << eom)
433  // trajmsg_debug( "traj adiabatic trans momentum = "<< aValue.GetTransMomentum() << eom)
434  // trajmsg_debug( "traj adiabatic lorentz factor = "<< aValue.GetLorentzFactor() << eom)
435  // trajmsg_debug( "traj adiabatic long velocity = "<< tLongVelocity << eom)
436  // trajmsg_debug( "traj adiabatic trans velocity = "<< tLongVelocity << eom)
437 
438  aDerivative = 0.;
439  aDerivative.AddToTime( 1. );
440  aDerivative.AddToSpeed( sqrt( tLongVelocity * tLongVelocity + tTransVelocity * tTransVelocity ) );
441 
442  for( int Index = 0; Index < fTerms.End(); Index++ )
443  {
444  fTerms.ElementAt( Index )->Differentiate(aTime, aValue, aDerivative );
445  }
446 
447  return;
448  }

450  STATICINT sKSTrajTrajectoryAdiabaticDict =
451  KSDictionary< KSTrajTrajectoryAdiabatic >::AddCommand( &KSTrajTrajectoryAdiabatic::SetIntegrator, &KSTrajTrajectoryAdiabatic::ClearIntegrator, "set_integrator", "clear_integrator" ) +
452  KSDictionary< KSTrajTrajectoryAdiabatic >::AddCommand( &KSTrajTrajectoryAdiabatic::SetInterpolator, &KSTrajTrajectoryAdiabatic::ClearInterpolator, "set_interpolator", "clear_interpolator" ) +
453  KSDictionary< KSTrajTrajectoryAdiabatic >::AddCommand( &KSTrajTrajectoryAdiabatic::AddTerm, &KSTrajTrajectoryAdiabatic::RemoveTerm, "add_term", "remove_term" ) +
454  KSDictionary< KSTrajTrajectoryAdiabatic >::AddCommand( &KSTrajTrajectoryAdiabatic::AddControl, &KSTrajTrajectoryAdiabatic::RemoveControl, "add_control", "remove_control" );
455 
456 }
